summary: From January to April 2023, I interned as a Software Engineer at Virtuollis LLC. I developed scalable REST APIs with Node.js and Express, supporting a 50% increase in user traffic. I resolved critical production issues, reducing downtime by 75%, and collaborated with the design team to enhance the user interface, increasing engagement by 20%.

From August 2021 to November 2023, I was the Back of House Supervisor at a Chick-Fil-A franchise in Ontario, Canada. I managed kitchen operations, inventory, staff training, and equipment maintenance, ensuring high food quality and safety standards. My leadership fostered a productive work environment.

From August 2021 to October 2023, I worked as a Printing Press Operator at Imaflex USA in Ontario, Canada. I operated and maintained printing press machines, ensuring quality and adherence to production schedules. My role required troubleshooting, regular maintenance, and compliance with safety and quality standards, which I consistently upheld.
